key.name: new-window
key.summary: Open new window

key.name: live-alt-tab
key.summary: Switch to previously active window

key.name: live-alt-tab-backward
key.summary: Switch to previously active window, backward order

key.name: live-alt-tab-scratch
key.summary: Switch to previously active scratch window

key.name: live-alt-tab-scratch-backward
key.summary: Switch to previously active scratch window, backward order

key.name: previous-workspace
key.summary: Switch to previously active workspace

key.name: previous-workspace-backward
key.summary: Switch to the previously active workspace, backward order

key.name: move-previous-workspace
key.summary: Move the active window to the previously active workspace

key.name: move-previous-workspace-backward
key.summary: Move the active window to the previously active workspace, backward order

key.name: switch-down-workspace
key.summary: Switch to workspace below (ws only from current monitor)

key.name: switch-up-workspace
key.summary: Switch to workspace above (ws only from current monitor)

key.name: switch-down-workspace-from-all-monitors
key.summary: Switch to workspace below (ws from all monitors)

key.name: switch-up-workspace-from-all-monitors
key.summary: Switch to workspace above (ws from all monitors)

key.name: move-down-workspace
key.summary: Move window one workspace down

key.name: move-up-workspace
key.summary: Move window one workspace up

key.name: move-monitor-right
key.summary: Move the active window to the right monitor

key.name: move-monitor-left
key.summary: Move the active window to the left monitor

key.name: move-monitor-above
key.summary: Move the active window to the above monitor

key.name: move-monitor-below
key.summary: Move the active window to the below monitor

key.name: switch-monitor-right
key.summary: Switch to the right monitor

key.name: switch-monitor-left
key.summary: Switch to the left monitor

key.name: switch-monitor-above
key.summary: Switch to the above monitor

key.name: switch-monitor-below
key.summary: Switch to the below monitor

key.name: swap-monitor-right
key.summary: Swap workspace with monitor to the right

key.name: swap-monitor-left
key.summary: Swap workspace with monitor to the left

key.name: swap-monitor-above
key.summary: Swap workspace with monitor above

key.name: swap-monitor-below
key.summary: Swap workspace with monitor below

key.name: toggle-scratch-window
key.summary: Toggle the most recent scratch window

key.name: toggle-scratch-layer
key.summary: Toggles the floating scratch layer

key.name: toggle-scratch
key.summary: Attach/detach the active window into the scratch layer

key.name: take-window
key.summary: Take the window, dropping it when finished navigating

key.name: switch-focus-mode
key.summary: Switch between Window Focus Modes (e.g. default, center)

key.name: switch-next
key.summary: Switch to the next window

key.name: switch-previous
key.summary: Switch to the previous window

key.name: switch-right
key.summary: Switch to the right window

key.name: switch-left
key.summary: Switch to the left window

key.name: switch-up
key.summary: Switch to the window above

key.name: switch-down
key.summary: Switch to the window below

key.name: switch-next-loop
key.summary: Switch to the next window (with wrap-around)

key.name: switch-previous-loop
key.summary: Switch to the previous window (with wrap-around)

key.name: switch-right-loop
key.summary: Switch to the right window (with wrap-around)

key.name: switch-left-loop
key.summary: Switch to the left window (with wrap-around)

key.name: switch-up-loop
key.summary: Switch to the window above (with wrap-around)

key.name: switch-down-loop
key.summary: Switch to the window below (with wrap-around)

key.name: switch-global-right
key.summary: Switch to the right window (no monitor boundary)

key.name: switch-global-left
key.summary: Switch to the left window (no monitor boundary)

key.name: switch-global-up
key.summary: Switch to the above window (no monitor boundary)

key.name: switch-global-down
key.summary: Switch to the below window (no monitor boundary)

key.name: switch-first
key.summary: Switch to the first window

key.name: switch-last
key.summary: Switch to the last window

key.name: move-right
key.summary: Move the active window to the right

key.name: move-left
key.summary: Move the active window to the left

key.name: move-up
key.summary: Move the active window up

key.name: move-down
key.summary: Move the active window down

key.name: slurp-in
key.summary: Consume the window to right into the active column

key.name: barf-out
key.summary: Expel the bottom window into its own column

key.name: resize-h-inc
key.summary: Increment window height

key.name: resize-h-dec
key.summary: Decrement window height

key.name: resize-w-inc
key.summary: Increment window width

key.name: resize-w-dec
key.summary: Decrement window width

key.name: cycle-width
key.summary: Cycle through useful window widths

key.name: cycle-width-backwards
key.summary: Cycle through useful window widths backwards

key.name: cycle-height
key.summary: Cycle through useful window heights

key.name: cycle-height-backwards
key.summary: Cycle through useful window heights backwards

key.name: center-horizontally
key.summary: Center window horizontally

key.name: toggle-maximize-width
key.summary: Maximize the width of the active window

key.name: paper-toggle-fullscreen
key.summary: Toggle fullscreen

key.name: activate-window-under-cursor
key.summary: Activate the window under mouse cursor

key.name: close-window
key.summary: Close the active window

key.name: index
key.summary: The workspace index

key.name: name
key.summary: The name of the workspace

key.name: background
key.summary: The background image

key.name: show-top-bar
key.summary: Show the topbar

key.name: color
key.summary: The background color

key.name: directory
key.summary: Affect various integrations. An empty string means use PWD. (usually ~)

key.name: restore-keybinds
key.summary: Keybind overrides saved for restoring after PaperWM disable

key.name: restore-attach-modal-dialogs
key.summary: Original setting value (used for restore)

key.name: restore-workspaces-only-on-primary
key.summary: Original setting value (used for restore)

key.name: restore-edge-tiling
key.summary: Original setting value (used for restore)

key.name: horizontal-margin
key.summary: Minimum margin from windows left and right edge

key.name: vertical-margin
key.summary: Minimum margin from windows top edge

key.name: vertical-margin-bottom
key.summary: Minimum margin from windows bottom edge

key.name: window-gap
key.summary: Minimum gap between windows

key.name: minimap-scale
key.summary: Scale of mini mini-map tiles compared to their actual window size.

key.name: minimap-shade-opacity
key.summary: Sets the opacity of the non-selected windows during minimap navigation.

key.name: edge-preview-scale
key.summary: Scale of window previews at tiling edge. Scale is percent of actual window size.

key.name: window-switcher-preview-scale
key.summary: Scale of window switch previewse. Scale is percent of actual window size

key.name: only-scratch-in-overview
key.summary: Limit window previews in the overview to scratch windows

key.name: disable-scratch-in-overview
key.summary: Don't show scratch windows in the overview

key.name: swipe-sensitivity
key.summary: Swipe sensitivity in [x, y] coordinates

key.name: swipe-friction
key.summary: Swipe friction in [x, y] coordinates

key.name: cycle-width-steps
key.summary: cycle-width cycles through these widths. value < 1 is interpreted as a ratio of the monitor width. Mixed ratios and pixel values not allowed.

key.name: cycle-height-steps
key.summary: cycle-height cycles through these heights. value < 1 is interpreted as a ratio of the monitor height. Mixed ratios and pixel values not allowed.

key.name: maximize-width-percent
key.summary: Percent of workspace width the horizontal window maximise function (Super+F) will use.

key.name: workspace-colors
key.summary: Workspace colors

key.name: default-background
key.summary: Default background image

key.name: use-default-background
key.summary: Use the default GNOME Shell background

key.name: default-show-top-bar
key.summary: Show the top bar on workspaces by default

key.name: default-focus-mode
key.summary: Set the default focus mode. 0:DEFAULT 1:CENTER

key.name: open-window-position
key.summary: Sets the position to open a new window (e.g right of current window). RIGHT: 0, LEFT: 1, START: 2, END: 3

key.name: disable-topbar-styling
key.summary: Disables all topbar styling by PaperWM

key.name: show-workspace-indicator
key.summary: Show the workspace indicator/name in the topbar

key.name: show-window-position-bar
key.summary: Show the window position bar in the topbar

key.name: show-focus-mode-icon
key.summary: Show the focus mode icon in the topbar

key.name: animation-time
key.summary: Duration of animations in seconds

key.name: overview-max-window-scale
key.summary: Sets the maximum window scale (compared to actual window size) of Gnome overview windows

key.name: overview-min-windows-per-row
key.summary: Sets the minimum number or windows per row before adding a new window row

key.name: overview-ensure-viewport-animation
key.summary: Sets the animation when exiting GNOME overview and ensuring selected window is in view. 0:NONE, 1:TRANSLATE, 2:FADE

key.name: winprops
key.summary: Array of winprops as (JSON) string objects

key.name: gesture-enabled
key.summary: Enables PaperWM touchpad gestures

key.name: gesture-horizontal-fingers
key.summary: Number of fingers for tiling horizontal swipe. 0:DISABLED 3:THREE_FINGERS 4:FOUR_FINGERS

key.name: gesture-workspace-fingers
key.summary: Number of fingers for workspace switching. 0:DISABLED 3:THREE_FINGERS 4:FOUR_FINGERS
